statement: 03. Labyrinth-3time limit per test8 secondsmemory limit per test512 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputSee the problem statement here:http://codeforces.com/contest/921/problem/01.

processed.result:
You are given a grid of $n$ rows and $m$ columns. Each cell in the grid can be either empty or blocked. You start at the top-left corner of the grid. Your goal is to reach the bottom-right corner of the grid, moving only down or right. 

You can only move to an empty cell.  

Determine the number of distinct paths you can take to reach the bottom-right corner.

You are given a grid of cells. Some cells contain obstacles. You start at a designated cell and need to reach another designated cell. You can only move up, down, left, or right. Find the shortest path between the two cells, avoiding obstacles.
